Name: Shahnoza
description:
Shahnoza is 23 years old. She is married and has two children, aged 2 and 4 years old.

She has been busy growing agricultural products - vegetables and crops. She began her business three years ago. She earns additional income from animal husbandry. Shahnozaâ€™s husband helps her with managing the business. 

Shahnoza wants to improve her living conditions. She is asking for a loan of 2,300 TJS to buy furniture for her household. She awaits your support.
